text: www. etonline. com / Thursday, 7 September 2017 17 : 26 : 12 The 29 - year - old singer graces the cover of not one, not two, but three Ellemagazines in celebration of the upcoming launch of her Fenty Beauty by Rihanna makeup line - - as well as her sixth stint as cover girl.
